::Cerberus::

    A vortex opened and from it stepped a monstrosity. It was=
 a Transformer, with a predetermined Beast Mode, that of a three headed dog=
, with a dragon's tail. It had chitinous black armor covering it's body. Un=
der the armor was crimson red fur. It all the heads looked around at it's n=
ew home. Then it Transformed to robot mode. One of it's hands was the three=
 heads, the other was a regular hand. On the back of it's ugly robot face w=
as the Dragon tail. He walked towards what was left of the Destron base.
  =
  "Attention all remaining Destrons," He said. "I have been sent by Magmatr=
on himself to lead you to victory."
    He looked at the base, he hoped the=
 main computer was still there. "My name, is Cerberus."
